review_data.content: Grumpy staff, old and rundown inside. Seems like the staff are overworked, this could have been the reason for their shortness with the customers.

review_data.title: Newly renovated
review_data.content: Café Zaehringer was closed for a short period for a total renovation of the place. The walls were stripped bare, new floors, a new display case and counter, and there is a brighter color and a more open atmosphere. The spacious sidewalk seating remains. The...More

review_data.title: Good desserts, good location
review_data.content: Food is OK and relatively cheap for Zürich standards. Service is good. Desserts were the best thing we ate. Suggested if you need a non-expensive place in Zürich downtown.

review_data.title: Pleasant cafe, open on Sunday morning

review_data.title: Central, plesant low key cafe

review_data.title: YummySalad

review_data.title: Good place to meet friends
review_data.content: It's a nice place to go with your friends and drink something. They have as well food which looked pretty tasty. It's in the old part of Zürich in the area called "Dörfli".

review_data.title: Quirky place w good food and service
review_data.content: I had fish and chips. The fish was super flavorful. The crust was crispy. The fries were hand cut and well seasoned. I had a lovely rose also. The inside has books and games so you may want to stay awhile....

review_data.title: Really nice local place!

review_data.title: Good rosti!
review_data.content: This place is very funky, eclectic and has good coffee shop fare. Stop in if you're in Old Town Zurich and need a cup of good coffee and a snack.

review_data.title: A good vegetarian option in Zurich
review_data.content: My lovely vegetarian wife gets her pick of restaurants when we go to the developed world and this place didn't disappoint. She had a veggie stir fray and I had the schnitzel. We left happy and would go back!

review_data.title: Chill place, great soup
